trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Bay City
There were no other sightings in Bay City on or around September 10th 2009
Summary: West northwest of Midland road, apperared to be yellow red blue and white lights just hovering.
divs: Sighting DetailsObject appeared to have several colors red white blue and yellow however, most of the time it was red and blue. I looked at the object with a pair of simmons field glasses, they are a cheap set but really made a difference.It seemed to hover and was far enough off to make no sound that I could hear. I had seen an object similar to this only one other time and managed to get it on video. It was so far away by the time I got my camera all you can see is an object changing colors almost a flicker.I have seen several things that were strange, Maybe there is an explaination for what I seen, but I can say it was not a helicopter or an airplane. There are no towers over that way at least none that eventually move away. As
